title: Jimmy Bartel's girlfriend Lauren Mand says she 'couldn't be happier'
text:
Lauren Mand, the new girlfriend of retired AFL star Jimmy Bartel, has spoken for the first time about their controversial relationship.

In a post shared to her private Instagram account on September 24, the Melbourne-based socialite revealed she was 'content and couldn't be happier'.

The post was uploaded around the time Lauren moved back to Australia, after spending several months living in London, England.

'Couldn't be happier': Lauren Mand, the girlfriend of retired AFL star Jimmy Bartel, has spoken for the first time about their controversial relationship. Pictured in Melbourne on Thursday

The Instagram post, which is believed to be the first time she has referenced her relationship with Jimmy on social media, was discovered by New Idea on Monday.

Lauren has 1,095 followers on Instagram, including Jimmy and several lower-tier celebrities, but it is unclear who leaked the post to the magazine.

It comes after Jimmy and Lauren were pictured together in Melbourne on Thursday as they went shopping for baby supplies.

'Happy': In a post shared to her private Instagram account on September 24, the Melbourne-based socialite revealed she was 'content and couldn't be happier'

Private account: New Idea first reported on the existence of the Instagram post on Monday. Lauren has 1,095 followers on Instagram, including Jimmy and several lower-tier celebrities, but it is unclear who leaked the post (profile pictured)

The pair looked rather glum while stepping out of a discount pharmacy where they'd bought nappies, which were presumably for Jimmy's 11-month-old son Henley.

According to onlookers, they arrived at the shop together but quickly parted ways after realising they had been recognised.

Jimmy and Lauren's relationship was exposed in August, just days after his estranged wife, Nadia Bartel, confirmed they had separated.

It's over! Jimmy and Lauren's relationship was exposed in August, just days after his estranged wife, Nadia Bartel (left), confirmed they had separated. Pictured at a friend's wedding in June

In September, Daily Mail Australia revealed that Lauren was planning to move back to Australia after spending several months living in England.

She uploaded a post to a Facebook group for Australian expats in which she listed her two-bedroom London apartment for sublet.

In the ad, Lauren explained she would be returning home on September 22 and was looking for someone to take over her $1,500-a-month room 'ASAP'.

End of the road: The Bartels announced their separation on August 15, around two months after Nadia (pictured) moved out of their marital home in Melbourne

Whoops! At the time of their split, it was widely reported that Jimmy and Lauren were in a 'long-term relationship' that Nadia (right) had discovered through 'text messages'

The Bartels announced their separation on August 15, around two months after Nadia moved out of their marital home in Melbourne.

The former couple married in February 2014 in a lavish ceremony on the Bellarine Peninsula. They share two sons: three-year-old Aston and 11-month-old Henley.

At the time of their split, it was widely reported that Jimmy and Lauren were in a 'long-term relationship' that Nadia had discovered through 'text messages'.
description: The post was uploaded around the time Lauren moved back to Australia, after spending several months living in London , England
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
